column1: Your query : (TITLE-ABS-KEY(( "air transport"  OR  aviation  OR  airports  OR  airlines )  AND  (sustainability OR sustainable)) AND ( LIMIT-TO ( DOCTYPE,"ar" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( DOCTYPE,"cp" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( DOCTYPE,"ch" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( DOCTYPE,"re" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( DOCTYPE,"cr" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( DOCTYPE,"bk" ) )  AND ( LIMIT-TO ( LANGUAGE,"English" ) )  AND ( LIMIT-TO ( SRCTYPE,"j" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( SRCTYPE,"p" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( SRCTYPE,"k" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( SRCTYPE,"b" ) ) )
